Name: MY PSYCHOLOGIST | BOT-Assistant
About the game: Each of us, one way or another, had some problems that we cannot share. It's always hard and sometimes even frightening. This app is meant to be a pillow you can talk into. Moreover, this 'pillow' will really try to understand you and advise you something. Communication with characters on free topics is also encouraged. The assistant is continuously learning in the process of communicating with people, so buying it now, you will receive a constantly updated product that is only getting better. WARNING - This app is for communication only and is not a final resort in the field of psychological support. If you feel that you need help, it is better to contact a professional psychologist!
